I don’t know about you all, but my home is my favorite place to be! I love creating spaces that I never want to leave. I’ve been working on some projects and creating some mood boards / design boards that I've decided to post on here. I hope that you find something you love or something that inspires you! If you love this design, or any of it’s pieces, click on the links below to start creating your own dream bedroom!

The first part of this room that makes a big impact and arguably one of the most important parts is the bed. I picked this light grey color because I think it adds some brightness into an otherwise dark and moody room. If you are wanting a moodier look, which is totally in right now, I would go with the black linen bed linked below instead, and do a dark colored paint on the walls.

The side tables add a warmth to the space and pair well with the faux-leather lumber pillow and the accent chair. The dresser is absolutely stunning, and I will absolutely be adding it to my bedroom at some point in the future. It is definitely a splurge, so I added a cheaper black dresser option below too! All of the other accent pieces help to tie this room together and create a cozy space!

Gray Bed | Nightstand | Dresser | Black Accent Table | Accent Chair | Gray Lamp | Framed Flower Art | Candle | Moody Framed Wall Art | Cane Boxes | Faux Olive Plant | White Euro Pillows | Faux-Leather Lumbar Pillow | Rug | Cheaper Dresser Option | Cheaper Bed Option | Cheapest Bed Option | Black Linen Bed |

I hope this design board gave you the inspiration you were searching for - Let me know what design board you’d like to see me create next!

XOXO - Ray of Design
